title: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag Black Chest Edition P2PGAMES
description:
I am not normally upload game but since non of this game here working properly and i got this one working well, figure i share here.
All credit goes to P2PGAMES.
tested with Windows 8.1 Pro 64bit, 16gb ram on ASUS ROG 3D gaming laptop.
Saving function are working properly, play past level one.
Installing as usuall like NFO says.

Note :

In your Game Directory there will be a Uplay.txt file

Right Click that file and go to its Properties
and Check Mark Read-Only option. This makes that log file read only

If you do this your Game performance will be improved
This issue will be fixed in the upcoming cr4ck

Also
The V4 fixed is not a malware
The P2P group must've changed the name to their liking but to be clear this is a safe crack and not a malware

================

Dovah
